title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
OB: When previewing the chart, no friendly error message is displayed when there is no data for a series.
EB: I expect a friendly error message to be displayed when there is no data for a series in the chart preview.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Create a chart and set the data definition. 2. Select a column in the chart without any data. 3. Verify that no friendly error message is displayed.
